tool_description:
(FREE TRIAL)
Real time scraping API from sayweee.com supports the entire pre-purchase flow.
Grocery browsing and searching api based on location.
Provides product details, reviews and shipment information given specific product id.
name: Weee grocery API (sayweee.com) - browsing/searching/details
title: Weee grocery API (sayweee.com) - browsing/searching/details

api_list.name: product search (zipcode, keyword)
api_list.description:
provide list of products based on user's zipcode
response also includes available filters/sort and categories

api_list.name: product details (zipcode, product_id)
api_list.description:
provide detailed product information based on the product id and user's zipcode
product_id should come from the product search endpoint
response also contains detailed price and availability information
